name: Bear Pressure
description:
Game Description:

Global Game Jam 2018 - You play as an dynamic duo, made of a bear and a robin. In the hands of our brave heroes rest the fate of... packages. Jump your way across the city, ensuring that all the your delivery reach their destination. You will need to be quick, and stay on track, while your controller will guide you to the right destination through vibration.

Jam Site: 
NHTV Breda

Jam Year: 
2018

Platforms: 
MS Windows

Tools And Technologies: 
Unreal Engine

Credits: 

Giandomenic Lombardi - Design/Programming

AUDIO - A Bold Choice
DESIGN - Feathered Friends

NOTE:
Game requires a controller to play.
